summary: Feature request to add a meta client to the TypeScript SDK, as described in the Schedules proposal for higher-level client functionality.
userImpact: Users would have access to a higher-level meta client for enhanced functionality in the TypeScript SDK.
proposedFix: Implementation as described in the Schedules proposal for TypeScript SDK.
resolutionDetails: Already implemented by bergundy a couple weeks prior to the feature request.
keyQuote: I already did this a couple weeks ago.
